H0.text: Human cell is the object best seen with a microscope.

H1.text: Cow heart is the object best seen with a microscope.

H2.text: Oak leaf is the best object seen with a microscope.

H3.text: Chicken leg is the object best seen with a microscope.

A4.text: By 1935, he had built an electron microscope with twice the resolution of a light microscope, revealing previously unresolvable organelles.

A5.text: In 1665, Robert Hooke examined a thin slice of cork under his microscope, and saw a structure of small enclosures.

A6.text: 2006 animation of molecular mechanisms inside cells
